activities: Xign facilitates the processing of invoices and purchase orders for customers and their suppliers in the European Union.  These companies and suppliers are typically corporations.  As part of this processing Xign may collect personal information of employees of those companies or from individuals who are suppliers to Xign customers.
eucountries: Czech Republic, France, Iceland, Liechtenstein, Netherlands, Slovakia, United Kingdom, Austria, Denmark, Germany, Ireland, Lithuania, Norway, Slovenia, Belgium, Estonia, Greece, Italy, Luxembourg, Poland, Spain, Cyprus, Finland, Hungary, Latvia, Malta, Portugal, Sweden
recoursemech: Xign is a licensee of Truste (www.Truste.org) which provides 3rd party dispute resolution for unresolved compliants
